languages.text: В завихрениях тумана узнаются искаженные лица людей, преисполненные страданиями... и не только людей! Лица ксеносов-эльдаров словно сплавленные с человеческими, отчего облик багровых призраков становится еще омерзительнее. Их взгляды и ярость были устремлены на фигуры, застывшие друг против друга.

traits.locale_text: Клубящийся туман, что казался беспорядочной бурой массой, ведет себя словно живой. В его завихрениях узнаются искаженные лица людей, преисполненные страданиями... и не только людей! Лица ксеносов-эльдаров словно сплавленны с человеческими, отчего облик багровых призраков становится еще омерзительнее. Их взгляды и ярость... направлены на фигуры, застывшие друг против друга в сердце сего странного места.

languages.text: In the swirling mist all around {mf|him|her}, {name} could make out human faces stricken with torment... and not just human faces! There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.
languages.original_text: В завихрениях тумана узнаются искаженные лица людей, преисполненные страданиями... и не только людей! Лица ксеносов-эльдаров словно сплавленные с человеческими, отчего облик багровых призраков становится еще омерзительнее. Их взгляды и ярость были устремлены на фигуры, застывшие друг против друга.

There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.

languages.text: {name}は自身を中心に渦巻く霧の中、苦痛を与えられている人間の顔を認識する…いや、ただの人間の顔ではなかった！異種族、アエルダリ、その容貌が人間のものと融合しており、一段と禍々しい深紅の亡霊を構成していた。その視線と怒りは、向かい合って動かないふたつの人影に向けられていた。
languages.original_text: In the swirling mist all around {mf|him|her}, {name} could make out human faces stricken with torment... and not just human faces! There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.

traits.locale_text: {name}は自身を中心に渦巻く霧の中、苦痛を与えられている人間の顔を認識する…いや、ただの人間の顔ではなかった！異種族、アエルダリ、その容貌が人間のものと融合しており、一段と禍々しい深紅の亡霊を構成していた。その視線と怒りは、向かい合って動かないふたつの人影に向けられていた。

languages.text: 在周围翻腾的迷雾之中，{name}辨认出了那些饱受折磨的人类面孔……而且不仅仅只有人类，还有艾达灵族！这些深红色的幽灵，他们的五官与人类的五官融合在一起，看起来更加面目可憎。此刻，所有幽灵愤怒的目光，都死死地盯着那两个一动不动的身影。
languages.original_text: In the swirling mist all around {mf|him|her}, {name} could make out human faces stricken with torment... and not just human faces! There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.

traits.locale_text: 在周围翻腾的迷雾之中，{name}辨认出了那些饱受折磨的人类面孔……而且不仅仅只有人类，还有艾达灵族！这些深红色的幽灵，他们的五官与人类的五官融合在一起，看起来更加面目可憎。此刻，所有幽灵愤怒的目光，都死死地盯着那两个一动不动的身影。

languages.text: Dans la brume qui l'entourait, {name} pouvait distinguer des visages déformés par la souffrance, et dont la physionomie abominable mêlait des traits humains, xénos et aeldari. Leur regard plein de rage était rivé sur les deux silhouettes immobiles.
languages.original_text: In the swirling mist all around {mf|him|her}, {name} could make out human faces stricken with torment... and not just human faces! There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.

traits.locale_text: Dans la brume qui l'entourait, {name} pouvait distinguer des visages déformés par la souffrance, et dont la physionomie abominable mêlait des traits humains, xénos et aeldari. Leur regard plein de rage était rivé sur les deux silhouettes immobiles.

languages.text: En la caliginosa vorágine que le rodeaba, {name} podía distinguir rostros humanos atormentados... ¡y no solo humanos! También había xenos, Aeldari, cuyas facciones se fusionaban con las humanas, confiriendo un aspecto aún más abominable a los espectros carmesíes. Sus miradas iracundas estaban centradas en las dos figuras inmóviles que estaban encaradas.
languages.original_text: In the swirling mist all around {mf|him|her}, {name} could make out human faces stricken with torment... and not just human faces! There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.

traits.locale_text: En la caliginosa vorágine que le rodeaba, {name} podía distinguir rostros humanos atormentados... ¡y no solo humanos! También había xenos, Aeldari, cuyas facciones se fusionaban con las humanas, confiriendo un aspecto aún más abominable a los espectros carmesíes. Sus miradas iracundas estaban centradas en las dos figuras inmóviles que estaban encaradas.

languages.text: In dem wirbelnden Nebel überall um sich herum konnte {name} menschliche Gesichter ausmachen, die Qualen litten ... und nicht nur menschliche Gesichter! Es gab Xenos, Aeldari, deren Gesichtszüge mit denen der Menschen verschmolzen, wodurch die roten Geister noch abscheulicher aussahen. Ihre Blicke und ihre Wut waren auf die zwei reglosen Gestalten gerichtet, die einander anblickten.
languages.original_text: In the swirling mist all around {mf|him|her}, {name} could make out human faces stricken with torment... and not just human faces! There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.

traits.locale_text: In dem wirbelnden Nebel überall um sich herum konnte {name} menschliche Gesichter ausmachen, die Qualen litten ... und nicht nur menschliche Gesichter! Es gab Xenos, Aeldari, deren Gesichtszüge mit denen der Menschen verschmolzen, wodurch die roten Geister noch abscheulicher aussahen. Ihre Blicke und ihre Wut waren auf die zwei reglosen Gestalten gerichtet, die einander anblickten.

languages.text: {name}, etrafını saran siste ızdırap içindeki insan suratları görüyordu. Hepsi bu da değildi! Kızıl renkli hayaletler, suratları insanlarınkiyle birleşen zeno Aeldariler yüzünden daha da iğrenç duruyordu. Bu hayaletlerin bakışları ve öfkeleri, birbirine bakan iki hareketsiz silüete odaklanmıştı.
languages.original_text: In the swirling mist all around {mf|him|her}, {name} could make out human faces stricken with torment... and not just human faces! There were xenos, Aeldari, their features fused together with those of humans, which made the crimson spectres look all the more abominable. Their gazes and their rage were directed at the two unmoving figures facing each other.

traits.locale_text: {name}, etrafını saran siste ızdırap içindeki insan suratları görebiliyordu... Dahası da vardı! Suratları insanlarınkiyle birleşen Aeldari zenoları yüzünden, kızıl renkli hayaletler daha da iğrenç duruyordu. Bu hayaletlerin bakışları ve öfkeleri, birbirine bakan iki hareketsiz silüete odaklanmıştı.
